title: #329:  Mommie Dearest
description:
It was just supposed to be a simple performance. Shannon Beador's kids had formed a group called LOCK and were due to make their concert debut. But then Shannon's mother-in-law Donna showed up, and our lives were irreversibly changed. Come hear the whole story as well as the latest drama(ish) on Real Housewives of New Jersey. Plus, a new segment called Crappens Superfight!

00:00:00 - Intro
00:06:21 - Crappens Superfight!
00:14:25 - Real Housewives of Orange County
01:04:32 - Real Housewives of New Jersey
